content.content: Aaron_Bartsch:  Defisaver already has this tool using Aave flashloans   I know this money Lego concept is really appealing, but things like “paying back my debt without doing multiple transactions” should be integrated into our base product. It is great if secondary products offer this as well, but I personally would not use anything beside Maker interacting with my vault.

I think that’s a great point @ultraschuppi. If we are relying on third parties and promoting them for use within Oasis we are opening ourselves up to another layer of risk. What happens if the flashloan from Aave or DeFi Saver incorrectly preforms an action and opens a vault up for liquidation? Would MKR holders be on the hook because we advertised using these systems? I think if something has an important functionality it’s imperative that it can happen entirely within our own system.
